short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hintella helps you to make a better decision in your shopping process

ðŸª„ Say hello to your new Shopping Assistant

âœ… By using clever technology, Hintella's chrome extension can help you shop smarter and save you both time and money.

âœ… Hintella searches and finds the best and the most related product review videos uploaded on Youtube every day on each product page of Amazon automatically.

âœ… No More Missed Review Videos!
It's time to say goodbye to mindless shopping!
No hassle! Install Hintella now for free. Just keep shopping online, and get instant recommendations right where and when you need them.
We select the most related videos based on their reviewer credibility, by watching these videos before completing your purchases you can evaluate and compare products effortlessly.

âœ… We built Hintella because we're tired of companies deceiving people with inferior â€˜sponsored productsâ€™ and misleading reviews. We want to empower you to spend your money on only the best products that benefit not the store but the shopper â€” meaning you.

âœ… You need something more than shopping features like cash back, earning rewards and gold points, price drop, promo codes, special offers, price tracking, price history, and discounts to shop with confidence.
Hintella is a must-have free extension that should be used along side with other useful extensions like Honey, Keepa, Camelizer, Rakuten, Lustre, Pouch, Karma, ... to give you additional values.

âœ… We gather more than 5 billion amazon products periodically! and support amazon locales and different languages [ .com | .co.uk | .de | .co.jp | .fr | .ca | .it | .es | .in | .com.mx ]


âœ… Quick Access
No account needed. Just install and start saving money and making better decisions. It's FREE! ðŸŽ‰
This extension does not add any browser buttons. You can access and set it up on any Amazon product page.

âœ… We follow Chrome's minimum permissions privacy policy and only request the following permissions:
- Tab Permission: to interact with the browser's tab system
- Host Permission: gives us the ability to send CORS requests to these hosts (Amazon) A little bit technical, but it is related to Amazon
- We check every page's data you are visiting anonymously. without knowing who you are to recommend you the best video contents
